description.value:
At 20th level, you gain the power of genies to grant wishes. Once per day, you can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.s2p7a4biy7bl4ks2]{Limited Wish} as a spell-like ability. Such wishes must begin with the words “I wish,” and cannot duplicate a @Compendium[pf1.spells.nnj51dwfkwd15ngj]{Wish} you have granted within the past 24 hours. If you use this ability to duplicate a spell with a costly material component, you must provide that component.

You become immune to cold damage, and can use @Compendium[pf1.spells.q3st18udsalnyz5v]{Plane Shift} once per day to travel to or from the Plane of Water.
